content: repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to join in top of chain 1 finish off finishing and handle hold 2 squares wrong sides together join by single_crochet take your hook through the first st like you would to single_crochet normally then put your hook through the same st on the 2nd square yo pull your yarn through both sts and complete the single_crochet 3 single_crochet in each corner leave one side open when you get to the top of the 3rd side chain 80 join to top of other side of bag with a slip_stitch single_crochet across top of one side of the bag and then up around the 80 chain strap you may want to do 2 or 3 single_crochet in the join between the top of the bag and the strap when you get to the other side single_crochet across the other side of the opening and up the bump or bottom side of the chain 80 this is going to be the handle join to top of bag and finish off sew in ends line bag if you so want
